title: Almond and mushroom savoury
ingredients: ['Base', '100g (4 oz) whole grain biscuits (e.g. WeetabixÂ®)', '100g (4 oz) margarine or butter', '100g (4 oz) flaked almonds', '1/2 tablespoon mixed herbs', '100g (4 oz) ground almonds', '1 small onion, finely grated', '1 crushed clove garlic', 'seasoning to taste', 'Filling', '225g (8 oz) mushrooms', '50g (2 oz) butter', '1 tablespoon white wine', '1 tablespoon cream', 'seasoning to taste', 'freshly chopped parsley']
